description:
If there is a snapshot initiated by CloudBolt for this server, deletes it. Does not affect snapshots created directly in VMware.

This plugin may be exposed as a Server Action to make it available to server owners, or configured as part of an automated workflow such as an Orchestration Action or Rule.
name: Delete snapshot created by CloudBolt
script_filename: Sub File for Hook of Delete snapshot created by CloudBolt Script.py
